website_summaries.verdict: The Skechers GOmeb Speed 3 is lightweight and offers a little cushioning, which is good for neutral runners. Some of the materials used are just the same as the previous versions, yet this one was able to provide a better running performance. Although there were downsides like its high price and its stiffness, many testers found the features of this shoe worth the cost.
pros: The newer DuPont Delrin stability plate provides rigidity to the mid-foot
The construction is kept simple, with no added material, according to many testers
Most testers noted that the forefoot is a little wider than the previous versions, making it great for many types of feet
The foot is pinned closer to the mid-sole, which provide a snappier feel and an enhanced push off
Great for speed works and track sessions
An improved tongue consists of a thin fabric and thin foam for better comfort
Roomier upfront yet snug fit is felt around the middle section, according to testers
cons: Some runners were hesitant to buy it because of its slightly expensive price
Some runners found it a little too stiff
It is more on the minimalist type and may need some transitions before using it for long runs

customer_reviews.title: ouch!
customer_reviews.text: I got these cause they were light, and they are. But my leg really hurt after running 6 miles in them, unlike my old ASICs. It might be my weight (200 lbs) or it might be my running style (heavy heel striker) but whatever it is they hurt. Qualitywise they were good and i do feel a bit faster in them, but can't run sustained distances.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Lind

customer_reviews.title: Excellent running and daily wear shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Great fitting shoe. Got them for my high school aged son. He wears them frequently and says they are light and very comfortable. Excellent color and we got timely delivery. We would happily buy them again in the same or a different color.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dupont

customer_reviews.title: Buy a size bigger.
customer_reviews.text: Over all the feeling of this shoe on pavement was very nice. I felt like it had excellent support. You need to consider purchasing one half size higher if you have wide feet. The big toe rubs weird on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: J3ffr3yJuic3box

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like these as much as the Razor
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like these as much as the Razor. I returned them and bought another Razor. Just a comfort deal. I am sure they work for the right runner.
customer_reviews.author: Goose

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoes. I have been using the Skechers GoRun or GoMeb for years now. I am a runner and I have tried so many brands like Nike, Asics, Newton, etc. And since I tried the Skechers GoRun I have stick to this brand. They are light, comfortable and very durable! Is not that expensive for what you are getting.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Velez

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, especially for new runners!
customer_reviews.text: Ran my first half marathon in these bad boys! Light shoe, good ground contact. For me next time I will order a half size larger for longer distance runs, my feet swell, but I loved this product!
customer_reviews.author: John D Walls JR

customer_reviews.title: I like theses shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like theses shoes, they are very light weight. Definitely on the minimalist side. The heal feels more narrow than the prior version, makes it more comfortable to mid foot strike instead of heal strike.
customer_reviews.author: David Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Comfy athletic shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great comfortable athletic shoes which I use for every day walking and love the. The price is also a great consideration.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty Blades

customer_reviews.title: Good light weight shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight shoe... More for racing than training. I'll be using this for speed training and short runs only.
customer_reviews.author: glenn-the-runner

customer_reviews.title: Sketchers Quality
customer_reviews.text: Typical Sketcher quality & fit. I own 10 pairs of Sketchers & would buy more if I had room for them.
customer_reviews.author: Mick0311

customer_reviews.title: These are just as nice as the women's shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are just as nice as the women's shoes, and are perfect for weekly 5 mile hikes. My son loves the "Halo" colors!
customer_reviews.author: M K Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit and nice light-weight neutral runners
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable fit and nice light-weight neutral runners. The sole surface material needs to be much more resilient. even after a few light runs on the treadmill, the surface showed some wear and I'm a light, efficient, and very neutral mid-foot striking runner.
customer_reviews.author: V's Delight

customer_reviews.title: I love them, BRIGHT ORANGE
customer_reviews.text: I love them , BRIGHT ORANGE ! can't miss my feet now .
customer_reviews.author: Paul Broski

customer_reviews.title: Really like the fit and how they feel
customer_reviews.text: Really like the fit and how they feel. However, it collapses laterally while running and gives me some knee pain.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: A half size bigger would have been perfect I ended up getting the speed 4s and the ...
customer_reviews.text: A half size bigger would have been perfect I ended up getting the speed 4s and the best racing flats I've had in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit; true to size. Midsole is pretty firm. Great for speed work.
customer_reviews.author: Kip

customer_reviews.title: Super shoe
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my husband and were exactly how I expected. He loves them. Very comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.author: BSK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Light running shoes for speed not long runs over 10 miles.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. 4th pair in a row. Not crazy about these specific colors but at clearance prices, they run just as great as the pretty ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I need more support...
customer_reviews.text: These are really light and comfy, but I can't run in them. I need a little more support. I've tried a couple of short runs in them, and it just feels jarring every time a foot hits the ground. Thought I would try them after reading Meb's book, but guess I have to stick with my Asics.
customer_reviews.author: C. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Skechers GOmeb Speed3 Running shoes looked really good on the website BUT even better once received & opened. They fit like a glove, very comfortable. I walk a lot & run for exercise & these Skechers are ideal.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Pfluger

customer_reviews.title: Love em!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this shoe. Love the color. But people make fun of me all the time for wearing it. I get a lot of negative comments from friends and weird looks from strangers. I don't care, I still love the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: too small and came without paper work to return or ...
customer_reviews.text: too small and came without paper work to return or exchange. Please let me know how I can exchange for a half size larger,111/2 Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Skechers Men's Go MEB Speed 3 2016 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: The next generation of Skechers' Meb's signature racing shoe is better than ever: A sleek synthetic and mesh upper combined with a high impact shock absorbing midsole that utilises Dupont Delrin stability material Resalyte™ material fuses to a running shoe with minimal weight and maximal shock absorption. Upper Coming with a nearly seamless GOknit upper, the Go Meb Speed 3 features an improved fit and comfort with a wider forefoot for a more natural feel, comfortability and breathability as well as an aesthetic, colourful knit-in look whilst hotmelt synthetic overlay details help keeping the foot stable and secure. While the seamless interior is made of microfibre lining that maximises comfort, the laces come with nearly weightless reinforced eyelets which overall contributes to the shoe's ultimate lightweight. Midsole Radically lightweight with just enough integrated, enhanced Resalyte™ midsole cushioning to protect on practically any surface the Go Meb Speed 3 features a proprietary lightweight injection-molded compound with memory retention that helps absorb impact and protect the foot from additional impact during the initial heel contact phase and enhanced response during the toe off whilst bringing you closer to a barefoot experience and providing sufficient impact protection at the same time. The incorporated mid-foot M-Strike Technology promotes a fluid transition and efficiency in each stride while the applied Dupont Delrin material Stability Plate in the mid foot provides support and security when out on the run while keeping weight to a minimum. Outsole The Go Meb Speed 3 comes with independent circular GOimpulse sensors that offer flexibility and feedback for a more responsive and optimised running experience as well as a smoother transition through the gait cycle. Impulse sensors isolate points of contact to deliver sensory feedback.
feature_bullets: GOimpulse Sensors on outsole - Offer flexibility and feedback for a smoother transition and responsive running experience.
M-Strike Technology - Mid-foot strike zone that promotes a fluid transition and efficiency in each stride.
Lightweight - No extra material, no extra weight, nothing to slow you down.
GOknit Upper - Virtually seamless, comfortable and breathable.
Hotmelt synthetic overlay detail - Keep the foot stable and secure.
